mapper.select: SELECT a.iccid, a.account_id as accountId, a.user_id as userId, a.user_name username, b.iccid_balance iccidBalance, c.month_to_date_data_usage as monthToDateDataUsage FROM (select * from jasper_terminal_details where iccid=#{iccid}) c , store_terminnal_detail a LEFT JOIN account_iccid_cost b ON a.iccid = b.iccid WHERE a.iccid = #{iccid}
SELECT product_id as productId, product_name as productName FROM product WHERE sharing_mode = #{sharingMode} AND status ="added" AND is_delete =0 AND ( OWNER = "平台" OR OWNER = #{username} )
